page.title: 13HOUSING
page.content: {HOUSING - THE NEW ESTATE} DOLLIS VALLEY ESTATE IS A RATHER SMALL AREA BUT IS DENSELY POPULATED. IT CAN HOUSE ABOUT 600 FAMILIES. THERE ARE BLOCKS OF FLATS IN THE MIDDLE OF THE ESTATE AND TERRACED HOUSES ROUND THE EDGES. THE ESTATE WAS PUT UP ABOUT 17 YEARS AGO TO HELP THE HOUSING SITUATION IN BARNET. THE REINFORCED CONCRETE SECTIONS FROM WHICH THE HOMES ARE BUILT SEEMS TO HAVE CAUSED PROBLEMS WITH CONDENSATION. THEY ARE PUTTING TRADITIONAL SLOPING ROOFS OVER THE FLAT ONES BECAUSE WATER HAS LEAKED IN. THERE IS WASTELAND ON ONE SIDE AND A FEW SHOPS IN FRONT OF THE FLATS; THE SWEET SHOP ALSO ACTS AS A POST OFFICE. IT LOOKS VERY DULL AND BORING WITHOUT COLOURS AND THERE IS LITTER BY THE SHOPS. DURING THE DAY IT IS VERY QUIET BUT MUCH NOISIER WHEN THE SCHOOLS CLOSE.
